item.title: Check out my montage! [Forklift Simulator!]
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“HcoJustin, post:8, topic:488392”][quote author=TabbyKiller link=topic=606625.msg4228012#msg4228012 date=1361102850]
Machinima is a really bad company to partner with, once you’re with them they wont let you go (its apart of the contract). And with the time that you are with them they will eventually cut your pay, I’ve seen this happen to various Machinima partners like MrTechDifficult. There are plenty more other and more reliable networks to partner with, cannot remember them off by heart but I will look into it for you.

You can try get a partnership with this company (mind that you have no copyrighted material on your channel). Don’t worry it’s legit, friends of mine have been partnered using this network and really they have the lowest requirements. You can literally partner with them with only 100 subscribers.
[/quote]
Obvious joke thread isn’t obvious enough.

But since we’re on the subject… Not all of their contracts force you with them for life, that was just one horror story that recently went public. They stopped doing those a while ago. The pay cuts also broke the contract and gave every person affected a chance to leave and switch networks if they really wanted to. Where did you get the story about MTD?

Yeousch or IGN are two other big networks to go with.[/quote]
This is NOT a joke, you sick fuck how could you say that about my future career

Read full topic

item.title: Check out my montage! [Forklift Simulator!]
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

[quote=“HcoJustin, post:8, topic:488392”][quote author=TabbyKiller link=topic=606625.msg4228012#msg4228012 date=1361102850]
Machinima is a really bad company to partner with, once you’re with them they wont let you go (its apart of the contract). And with the time that you are with them they will eventually cut your pay, I’ve seen this happen to various Machinima partners like MrTechDifficult. There are plenty more other and more reliable networks to partner with, cannot remember them off by heart but I will look into it for you.

You can try get a partnership with this company (mind that you have no copyrighted material on your channel). Don’t worry it’s legit, friends of mine have been partnered using this network and really they have the lowest requirements. You can literally partner with them with only 100 subscribers.
[/quote]
Obvious joke thread isn’t obvious enough.

But since we’re on the subject… Not all of their contracts force you with them for life, that was just one horror story that recently went public. They stopped doing those a while ago. The pay cuts also broke the contract and gave every person affected a chance to leave and switch networks if they really wanted to. Where did you get the story about MTD?

Yeousch or IGN are two other big networks to go with.[/quote]
Is there a joke that I am missing? Besides the video? Because with 500k views I think he is serious black. Also MrTechDifficulty made a video himself about his problems with Machinima, I believe he was commentating over Halo gameplay and it wasn’t that long ago.

Read full topic
